model_thoughts.thinking: The easiest way to move forward is to cancel the form again.

model_thoughts.evaluation_previous_goal: I cancelled the form again. Now, I hope I can successfully submit the comment this time.

model_thoughts.next_goal: Type in the comment and submit it.
model_thoughts.thinking: Hopefully the form will not reappear this time.

model_thoughts.memory: I tried to comment on the video, however, each time I tried to type or submit, a form would appear and I would cancel it. This happened multiple times.
